Question
========

A number of patients are given (normally distributed) measurement is done. Which test is most appropriate here to test a difference in population mean before and after treatment?

Answerlist
----------

* F-test
* Pearson correlation coefficient test
* Pooled T test
* Paired T test

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* F-test: Incorrect
* Pearson correlation coefficient test: Incorrect
* Pooled T-test: Incorrect
* Paired T-test: Correct
